description:
Sana recruited http://anidb.net/ch119241 [Ryuusei] in order to save the Sokai High School GUNPLA club, whose survival was threatened by a lack of members. Though she rated herself poorly as a GUNPLA Fighter, Sana`s individual personality awakened through continued activity, and she came to enjoy GUNPLA with all her heart.
Source: gundam.info
name: Miyama Sana
